testcase.name: Posts API POST /api/posts/create should create a new post
Posts API GET /api/posts/findAll should get all posts
Posts API GET /api/posts/:postId should get a single post by postId

failure.message: expected { Object (_events, _eventsCount, ...) } to have status code 200 but got 404
